name: DonMahLuvinLandry Horror Game Remake
description:
You're going to the YouTube dimension because you watched DonMahLuvinLandry's channel at 3am! To get out of here, you have to kill the founder of the channel DonMahLuvinLandry (Sorry for such a harsh description, Don!).

The game is dedicated to YouTuber DonaldLandry: https://www.youtube.com/c/DonMahLuvinLandry

5 people participated in the creation of the game.
